column4: Hi- I'm sorta new to Linux... I have one question. I still have a lot of diskspace left on my harddrive but it says I can't downlaod anything anymore because I need to free some diskspace. I dual boot (window & Linux). Does anyone know what to do?

Hi- I'm sorta new to Linux... I have one question. I still have a lot of diskspace left on my harddrive but it says I can't downlaod anything anymore because I need to free some diskspace. I dual boot (window & Linux). Does anyone know what to do?
so how do I allocate more?
